ComicInfo.Title: E.S.P.; Camp Is Champ; The Flying Carpet; Do-It-Yourself Captions; How to Make Vehicles Safer; Camp Comic Heroland; Low Calorie Everything; Real Cracked Books; Updated Torture Devices for Catching the Witches of Today; Cracked's G.I. Space Set; Vaughn-McCallum Roles of the Future
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.The owner of a flying carpet has to park next to a meter.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:38:36. [Issue ID 250419]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,Vic Martin,Bill Hoest,John Severin,Bill Ward,Bill Kresse
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,Vic Martin,Bill Hoest,John Severin,Bill Ward,Bill Kresse
